name: sambamba_merge_applet
title: Sambamba Mappings Merger
summary: Uses Sambamba to merge multiple sorted BAM files into a single BAM file

inputSpec.name: sorted_bams
inputSpec.label: Sorted mappings
inputSpec.help: A set of coordinate-sorted BAM files to be merged.

inputSpec.name: advanced_options
inputSpec.label: Advanced command line options
inputSpec.help: Advanced command line options that will be supplied directly to the Sambamba merge execution.

outputSpec.name: merged_bam
outputSpec.label: Merged sorted mappings
outputSpec.help: A BAM file with the merged mappings.
